attributes.action: Admit that MOD negligence and incompetence has lead to the deaths of many service people in Iraq and Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the Prime Minister to admit that the MOD is incompetent, negligent and holds in contempt the lives of service people fighting abroad.  Also, that such incompetence has directly resulted in the deaths of many service people in Iraq and Afghanistan.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
